ingredients: 1 inch ginger peeled and grated fresh
1 1⁄2 cup mung beans - fresh cut in thirds
1⁄2 pound shrimp - raw, shelled and deveined
3 tablespoons tamari (soy) sauce (Ginger Tamari Dipping Sauce)
1⁄4 teaspoon sesame oil (Ginger Tamari Dipping Sauce)
1 clove garlic - minced (Ginger Tamari Dipping Sauce)
1 teaspoon ginger - grated (Ginger Tamari Dipping Sauce)
1 teaspoon green onions - finely chopped (Ginger Tamari Dipping Sauce)
